comments:
Created 1.4.1895 out of the parish of Boldon. Abolished 1.4.1936 
    and divided between the parishes of Boldon, Heworth and Jarrow. See also Table 
    2, note (b).

Abolished 1.11.1921 and divided between the parishes of South Shields 
    and Whitburn.

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Hedworth Monkton & 
    Jarrow in Hebburn Urban District. See also Table 2, notes (b) and (b).
Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Jarrow, Hebburn and Monkton.

That part which until 1.4.1936 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Boldon Colliery, Hebburn and Monkton. See also Table 2, note (b).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Hedworth Monkton & 
    Jarrow in Jarrow Municipal Borough. See also Table 2, note (b).

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Hedworth Monkton 
    & Jarrow. Abolished 1.4.1936 and divided between the parishes of Jarrow, Boldon, 
    Hebburn, Heworth and South Shields. See also Table 2, note (b).

Abolished 1.4.1974 and added to the South Tyneside unparished area. See also Table 
    2, note (c).
Abolished 30.3.1897 and added to the parish of Westoe.

Abolished 1.4.1936 and divided between the parishes of Boldon and 
    South Shields. See also Table 2, note (a).
